name: CKDiscoverAllUserIdentitiesOperation
desc: An operation that uses the device’s contacts to search for discoverable iCloud users.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an operation for searching the device’s contacts.

items.name: var userIdentityDiscoveredBlock: ((CKUserIdentity) -> Void)?
items.desc: The closure to execute for each user identity.

items.name: var discoverAllUserIdentitiesCompletionBlock: ((Error?) -> Void)?
items.desc: The closure to execute when the operation finishes.
